channel.title: GAN on AesVoy
channel.description: Recent content in GAN on AesVoy

item.title: Generative Adversarial Network
item.description: In practice, a GAN’s generator creates fake images, which are then mixed with real images. The discriminator randomly selects an image from this mix to determine whether it is real or generated. Based on the discriminator’s accuracy, both the generator and discriminator are adjusted. After numerous iterations, the generator becomes proficient at producing realistic images.
